name: Extreme Cooking Adventure: Tower of Trial
name_original: Extreme Cooking Adventure: Tower of Trial
description:
Extreme Cooking adventure: Tower of Trial is a vertical platformer where you play as a little girl attempting to make her grandma a delicious snack, throughout the game you will be collecting ingredients while trying to avoid dangerous hazards that fill the tower. What snack you will be able to make at the end will depend on what you managed to bring with you to the top, where a mighty chef awaits you and will evaluate your cooking skills and score the dish you make.

Web version: tab instead of esc to bring up the menu. Fullscreen recommended
